ygData.subject: Re: What's wrong with you people?
ygData.msgSnippet: No, NPC s can see your religion at all times.  If you chose Tunare, walk around Neriak with dark elf illusuin on.  It will be a short walk, as at least one
ygData.messageBody:
No, NPC's can see your religion at all times. If you chose Tunare, walk
around Neriak with dark elf illusuin on. It will be a short walk, as at
least one guard after the first area will KOS.

-----Original Message-----
From: John S. Cuculic [mailto:jcuculic@...]
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 12:17 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] What's wrong with you people?


From: "John S. Cuculic" <jcuculic@...>

"Miller, Keith A." wrote:
> we need to be agnostic or illusions are worthless

???

Is this because of faction, that NPCs can see easily?
(But we can't even check to remember what deity we chose!)
